meanings.definition: A person who is highly skilled or knowledgeable in a particular field, especially science or technology.
meanings.sent1: The boffin explained the complex theory in simple terms.
meanings.sent2: The young boffin impressed everyone with his computer skills.
meanings.sent3: The boffin's knowledge of robots saved the day in the science fair.
meanings.sent4: She was a boffin in the lab, dissecting the mysteries of the universe.
meanings.sent5: The boffin's expertise in chemistry was unmatched in the research team.

meanings.definition: To work as a scientist or researcher, especially in a technical or specialized field.
meanings.sent1: He decided to boffin in the field of genetics to find a cure.
meanings.sent2: She loves to boffin in the lab, discovering new elements.
meanings.sent3: The team will boffin all night to finish the experiment on time.
meanings.sent4: They boffin tirelessly to unlock the secrets of the ancient artifact.
meanings.sent5: In order to succeed, you must boffin diligently and with passion.
